‚Äúaadare‚Äù gana samahara aya dakinne wenasma aakara walata.samahara wita obath yowun wiye pasuwana wiwidha aakarayata aadare gana hithana,aadare karana kollek kellek wenna puluwan.hagim kiyana eewa minissu eka eka widihata makat karanawa.dan kale hama ekakma wkunana eke aadare witharak makat karanne nathuwa inne nane.kohoma hari kamak na.chuttak nawathila me lipiya kiyawanna.oba kollek,kellek nam meken obe jiwithayata gaththu deyak thiyenawanam, oyalage yaluwontath poddak denna meka kiyawanna kiyala.
